name: Seed Of The Arcane , Episode 1
description: Seed of the Arcane is an open world, action role play game, set in the fantasy world of Magion Islands, where magic and steel determine the future.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,10 Processor: i5 , 2nd generation Quarto Core Memory: 8000 MB RAM Graphics: 760 GTX DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6000 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: i5 , 3rd generation Quarto Core Memory: 16000 MB RAM Graphics: 960 GTX DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6000 MB available space
